vlive.korean: 커버 영상이면 어떡하지? What if it's a cover video? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: What if it's a cover video?

vlive.korean: 나 이거 영상에서 얘기했던 거 같은데 - 모모 아니야? I think I said this in the video. - Wasn't it MOMO? 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: I think I said this in the video. - Wasn't it MOMO?

vlive.korean: 영상 찍었었나 그때? 찍어줬지? 매니저 언니... Did we film a video then? We filmed it, right? Maybe the manager did... 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: Did we film a video then? We filmed it, right? Maybe the manager did...

vlive.korean: 중학교 체육대회 춤 영상 봤어요?' 그거 이거 얘기 나와서... "Did you watch the dance video from the middle school sports event?" Since this came out... 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: "Did you watch the dance video from the middle school sports event?" Since this came out...

vlive.korean: 영상이 잘려요? Video gets cut? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스 안녕! 보고싶다 ❤️
